title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count

Keep your kitchen clean and odor-free with Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Designed for everyday reliability, these 13-gallon bags feature Flex-tra strength for tear resistance and a secure red drawstring closure for easy lifting, tying, and carrying.

Key features:
- 13-gallon capacity: Ideal for tall kitchen cans and everyday household use.
- Flex-tra strength: Tear-resistant white plastic helps prevent rips, punctures, and leaks.
- Secure drawstring: Red drawstring closure cinches tight for a reliable seal and mess-free carry-out.
- Unscented: Great for scent-sensitive households while still containing everyday kitchen trash.
- Clean, simple look: White bags blend neatly into most kitchen setups.
- Alexa Voice Shopping enabled: Reorder quickly using your voice with compatible Alexa devices.
- Value pack: 50-count box provides a convenient household supply.

Specifications:
- Capacity: 13 gallons
- Count: 50 bags
- Scent: Unscented
- Material: Tear-resistant white plastic
- Strength: Flex-tra
- Closure type: Red drawstring

Perfect for kitchens, break rooms, and busy households, these durable, unscented bags deliver dependable performance and easy disposal every time.
